mapper.insert: insert into tab_seach_pages(keyword,keyword1,banner,filename,createtime,sate,catid,pid, page_title, page_keywords, page_description, page_banner_name, page_banner_url) values (#{keyword},#{keyword1},#{banner},#{filename},now(),0,#{catId},#{parentId}, #{pageTitle},#{pageKeywords},#{pageDescription},#{pageBannerName},#{pageBannerUrl})
mapper.select: select id,keyword,keyword1,banner,filename,createtime,sate,pid,isshow, page_title, page_keywords, page_description, page_banner_name, page_banner_url from tab_seach_pages where sate=0 and pid=#{id} order by createtime asc
mapper.update: update tab_seach_pages set sate=1 where id=#{id}
update tab_seach_pages set pid = -1 where pid=#{id}
mapper.select: select pid,id,keyword,keyword1,banner,filename,createtime,isshow,sate, page_title, page_keywords, page_description, page_banner_name, page_banner_url from tab_seach_pages where id=#{id} limit 1
select category_id as cid,path, en_name as category,lv from 1688_category where lv <= 5 and en_name !='' order by id asc
mapper.insert: insert into tab_seach_pages_details(sid,name,seach_url,keyword,catid,relateKeyWordUrl,anti_words,sort, banner_img_name, banner_img_url, banner_name, banner_describe) values (#{sid},#{name},#{seachUrl},#{keyword},#{catid},#{relateKeyWordUrl},#{antiWords},#{sort},#{bannerImgName},#{bannerImgUrl},#{bannerName},#{bannerDescribe})
mapper.select: select a.id,a.sid,a.name,a.seach_url,a.keyword,a.catid,a.relateKeyWordUrl,a.anti_words,a.sort,b.en_name as category, a.banner_img_name,a.banner_img_url, a.banner_name, a.banner_describe from tab_seach_pages_details a,1688_category b where a.catid=b.category_id and a.sate=0 and a.sid=#{sid} order by a.sort asc
mapper.update: update tab_seach_pages_details set sate=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.sid,a.name,a.seach_url,a.keyword,a.catid,a.relateKeyWordUrl,a.anti_words,a.sort,b.en_name as category, a.banner_img_name ,a.banner_img_url , a.banner_name , a.banner_describe from tab_seach_pages_details a,1688_category b where a.catid=b.category_id and a.id=#{id} limit 1
select count(id) from tab_seach_pages where keyword=#{keyword} and sate=0
select count(id) from tab_seach_pages where keyword=#{keyword} and id!=#{id} and sate=0
select count(id) from tab_seach_pages_details where name=#{name} and sid=#{sid} and sate=0
select count(id) from tab_seach_pages_details where name=#{name} and sid=#{sid} and id!=#{id} and sate=0
mapper.update: update tab_seach_pages set isshow=#{isshow} where id=#{id}

choose.when: UPDATE alidata.shop_url_authorized_info SET admin_id = #{adminId}, admuser = #{admuser}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, remark = #{remark}, valid= #{valid}, updatetime=NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
choose.otherwise: UPDATE alidata.shop_url_authorized_info SET file_name = #{fileName}, file_url = #{fileUrl}, img_file_url = #{imgFileUrl}, admin_id = #{adminId}, admuser = #{admuser}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, remark = #{remark}, valid= #{valid}, updatetime=NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alidata.shop_url_authorized_info (shop_id, file_name, file_url, img_file_url, admin_id, admuser, start_time, end_time, remark, valid, createtime, updatetime) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{fileName}, #{fileUrl}, #{imgFileUrl}, #{adminId}, #{admuser},#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{remark}, #{valid}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, shop_id shopId, file_name fileName, file_url fileUrl, admin_id adminId, admuser, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, remark, valid FROM alidata.shop_url_authorized_info WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND valid != 3 LIMIT 1
